__e: Years ago, he was in a similar program.
I thought that he was going like his mother, that it was madness.
Yeah, in fact, his dad is the guy who followed me that day I came to visit you.
She told me that she was following a man
Where the hell did you get this from? .A. I'm asking you, who gave it to you!
She was in one of your classes a long time ago.
The foreman has approached me about being followed by someone from one of your legal teams.
No, look, she said she was following up on some lead about her mom.
There could still be the killer out there, and far as we know, she was following up on a lead.
My father, he's a cop. By-the-book guy. Believed in the law.
He didn't seem to understand he was just a man in distress from following orders.
They said if we follow the rules, no one would get hurt.
He was following you not because I asked him to, but because he knows, as I do... that you are an enemy of Gotham.
Okay, but that doesn't mean that the kidnapper wasn't already following them, right?
I was crazy when I lived with a guy who followed me like a dog.
